text:
="preserve">Remake means to create something once again. It usually means a movie, television series or video game. A remake tells the same story as the original but uses a different group of actors. It may change the theme or target audience.
A remake may change some parts of the plot. For example, the 1968 movie "The Thomas Crown Affair" is centered on a bank robbery. The 1999 remake involves the theft of a valuable painting.
